ballpark.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a number or amount that is approximately correct, though not exact
ballpark.translation[0].definitions[0].e: A spokeswoman said that the two ministers had discussed a ballpark figure for financial aid.
ballpark.translation[0].definitions[1].d: used to say that an amount or price is approximately right, wrong, the same
ballpark.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Pricing is being left to each of the six manufacturers, but all are expected to be in the same ballpark.
